name: The Best Game (ever)
description:
Simple asteroids type game.
Written in C++ using RayLib.

I don't care if it sucks.
It's the best game (ever).

You may get a windows defender alert but believe me, 
I'm too dumb to program a virus.

Keybinds:

Space - thrust
Left mouse click - shoot
Mouse - steering
Scroll - Master volume
M - Mute music
Q - restart

Do not click apostrophe key.
